metadata.title: CVE-2021-28879 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.52.0, the Zip implementation canreport an incorrect size due to an integer overflow. This bug can lead to abuffer overflow when a consumed Zip iterator is used again.

criterions.comment: rustc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
